attributes.action: USA Embassy to pay £11,544,455.00 congestion charge debt before Trump enters UK.
attributes.background: Donald Trump is a Climate Change denier and has undermined international agreements on carbon emissions. London has some of the worst air pollution in the world and his embassy cars have contributed to this. Make it clear to Trump that when you are in our country you should play by our rules.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the US Embassy, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
